com.gregorczuk.romantoarabic.server.model

Class Converter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gregorczuk.romantoarabic.server.model.Converter

  • public class Converter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class represents model of application. It has methods to perform convert of given Roman numerals to Arabic numerals. Also it provides correctness validation of input data. Results of convert are stored in list of Integers.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Patryk Gregorczuk

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> arabicNumerals
      Private field that holds list of Integers which respresent result of conversion.
      private java.util.Map numeralsMap
      Private field that holds map used for converting letter to number.
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> romanNumerals
      Private field that holds list of Strings accepted to conversion by RomanNumeralsValidator class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Converter

        public Converter()
        Constructor of this class. Initializes internal containers.

    • Method Detail

      • getResult

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getResult()
        Returns:
        Method returns result of conversion - Arabic numerals as a list of Integers.

      • getRomanNumerals

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRomanNumerals()
        Returns:
        Method returns input data after validation - Roman numerals as a list of Strings.

      • convert

        public void convert()
        Method begins conversion. It reads Roman numerals from List held in model and pass them one by one to converting method.

      • convertRomanNumeralToArabic

        private void convertRomanNumeralToArabic(java.lang.String romanNumeral)
        Method converts given string that represents correct Roman numeral to int which represents Roman numeral value as Arabic numeral and puts that int to list of Integers.
        Parameters:
        romanNumeral - the string that represents correct Roman numeral.

      • receiveData

        public void receiveData(java.util.List<java.lang.String> inputData)
                 throws IncorrectDataException
        Method starts validation process of incoming data and if they are correct puts them to inner containers.
        Parameters:
        inputData - the list of data that is going to be converted.
        Throws:
        IncorrectDataException - If data were not validated correctly.

      • validateIncomingData

        private boolean validateIncomingData(java.lang.String stringToValidate)
        Method checks given string if it represents correct Roman numeral.
        Parameters:
        stringToValidate - the string which will be checked.
        Returns:
        true if stringToValidate is correct. false if stringToValidate is empty or incorrect.

      • clearData

        public void clearData()
        This method clears inner containers.
